name: BBQ Angus
description: Juicy prime cuts of halal Angus beef topped with crispy chicken strips, fresh Boston lettuce, Melty Emmental cheese, and a smoky barbeque sauce, all nestled in a double split bun.

name: Chicken mac
description: An unbelievable sandwich made with 2 breaded Halal chicken patties, cheese, lettuce, creamy mayo and a bun in the middle!

name: McRoyal
description: The McRoyale has it all! A juicy Halal beef patty accompanied by cheese, crispy lettuce, fresh tomatoes, onions, zesty pickles, and spread with mayonnaise, ketchup and mustard.

name: Chicken combo
description: Hot and spicy chicken pieces paired with hot sauce, cheese and fresh veggies all stacked inside Kudu?s fresh bread, served with fries and soft drink

name: Beef combo
description: Hot and spicy chicken pieces paired with hot sauce, cheese and fresh veggies all stacked inside Kudu?s fresh bread, served with fries and soft drink

name: Cheese omelet combo
description: Tasty omelet sandwich Combo paired with cheese, lettuce and fresh tomato. Wouldn't be complete without hash browns and refreshing juice

name: B
description: Angus beef patty | cheddar cheese | iceberg lettuce | onion | tomato | pickles | with Section-B special sauce

name: A
description: 180g prime rib patty | mature cheddar cheese onion bacon marmalade | arugula.

name: V
description: Lentil | quinoa | mushrooms and corn patty | american cheese and sb sauce

name: Fish fillet meal
description: 6 fish fillet pieces come with fries, a bun and your choice of 2 sauces (tartar/cocktail/nugget/garlic sauce)

name: Jumbo shrimp meal
description: 8 or 10 jumbo shrimp pieces come with fries, a bun and your choice of 2 sauces (cocktail/nugget/garlic sauce)

name: Albaik chicken meal
description: 4 pieces chicken meals come with fries, a bun and 2 garlic sauces

name: Dynamite Philly Cheese Steak
description: Slices of Beef Steak, Onions, Green Peppers, Mushrooms, Mozzarella, American Cheese & Dynamite Sauce

name: Meatzza
description: Beef Pepperoni, Italian Sausage, Mozzarella & Signature Tomato Sauce

name: Margherita
description: A Rich Layer of Real Mozzarella & Signature Tomato Sauce
